EU probes AliExpress over possibly illegal online productsAlibaba's AliExpress could face a hefty fine after the European Commission on Thursday opened an investigation into dissemination of potentially illegal and pornographic materials, the third such probe after social media platform X and TikTok. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 13:12:40 GMT RGREXL5FSNO7ROKFVIXXHNP5FI https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-probes-aliexpress-over-possible-illegal-online-products-2024-03-14/Foo Yun Chee可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Former Treasury Secretary Mnuchin putting together investors to buy TikTok, CNBC reportsFormer U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin is putting together an investor group to try to buy TikTok, he told CNBC on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:43:56 GMT HIW4OZEG7FMN3IAETVK735GLBE https://www.reuters.com/technology/former-treasury-secretary-mnuchin-putting-together-investors-buy-tiktok-cnbc-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
Europe regulator says will take time needed to approve China jetEurope's air safety regulator will take whatever time is needed to approve China's C919 passenger jet, its top official told Reuters, dampening Beijing's hopes of quickly breaking into a market marked by jet shortages and a Boeing safety crisis. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:24:21 GMT GE3246PQNJKOVFTSITTANRS6K4 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/european-regulator-says-it-will-take-time-needed-to-approve-china-jet-2024-03-14/Tim Hepher, Joanna Plucinska商业航空航天与国防
China to host Davis Cup finals group stage matches for first timeChina will host Davis Cup finals group stage matches for the first time in September, the International Tennis Federation (ITF) said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 12:17:17 GMT 2Y7GQBEMFRO3NC2IC3FC2AXYQQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/china-host-davis-cup-finals-group-stage-matches-first-time-2024-03-14/Reuters运动的网球
Chinese automakers open factories abroad as export clout causes frictionChinese automakers seeking global growth are building more car factories in overseas markets, as foreign regulators mull imposing measures against imports of China-made electric cars. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:47:55 GMT N6B5PQNUPRO4BDZDFIUXDVCQME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automakers-open-factories-abroad-export-clout-causes-friction-2024-03-14/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China's plan to cut downpayments for cars likely to fall flat, analysts sayChina's efforts to boost auto sales by cutting downpayments on car loans stand to be frustrated by a price war and consumer caution, chiefly benefiting a few brands favoured by younger buyers, such as Tesla and Nio , analysts said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:35:01 GMT 5HKIOKC3XNOM3JLRLKTHWMQEPA https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-plan-cut-down payments-cars-likely-fall-flat-analysts-say-2024-03-14/Qiaoyi Li, Ziyi Tang, Brenda Goh商业汽车与交通
